dataModels.title: All Data Models
dataModels.info: A data model organizes data elements and specifies how they relate to one another and by which properties they are described.

vocabularies.title: Controlled Vocabularies
vocabularies.info: Controlled vocabularies are hierarchical or non-hierarchical lexica of reference terms. Due to their normative or standardized nature, controlled vocabularies improve data quality and make database searching more efficient than free-text fields.

updateDialog.title: Update cardinality
updateDialog.subtitle: Set the cardinality for property {{propertyLabel}}
updateDialog.cannotChange: Changing the cardinality is not possible.
updateDialog.warning: Please note that this change may not be reversible. Do you want to change the cardinality?

multipleValues.detail: At least one resource of the class "{{classLabel}}" has multiple "{{propertyLabel}}" properties in your data.
multipleValues.hint: In order to set the cardinality of "{{propertyLabel}}" to single, every resource "{{classLabel}}" must have only one "{{propertyLabel}}" value prior to this change.

required.detail: At least one resource of the class "{{classLabel}}" does not have a "{{propertyLabel}}" property in your data.
required.hint: In order to set the cardinality of "{{propertyLabel}}" to required every resource "{{classLabel}}" needs to have a "{{propertyLabel}}" value prior to this change.

searchTips.title: Search tips

searchTips.booleanSearch: Use AND, OR, NOT for boolean searches: Alice AND Wonderland
searchTips.wildcards: Use wildcards: Alice* will match Alice, Alices, etc.
